hero.title: Displays that stay crisp all day.
hero.subtitle: Color-accurate panels with smooth refresh for work and play.

overview.title: Clarity that stays sharp.
overview.body: Atlas monitors balance color accuracy, refresh rate, and eye comfort to keep you productive all day.

cards.title: Eye comfort
cards.body: Low blue light tuning and anti-glare coatings for long sessions.

cards.title: Fast response
cards.body: 5ms response for clearer motion and smooth scrolling.

cards.title: Simple setup
cards.body: HDMI and VGA inputs with quick plug-and-play use.

products.title: ATLAS 22" HD LED Monitor 16:10 Aspect Ratio, VGA & HDMI Input
products.subtitle: 22-inch, 16:10, HD panel
features: High Definition Display - 22-inch screen with 1680 x 1050 resolution and a 16:10 aspect ratio for clear and sharp visuals
Fast Response Time - 5ms response time for smooth performance, ideal for gaming and multimedia

products.title: ATLAS 19" Full HD LED Monitor with HDMI & VGA Ports
products.subtitle: 19-inch, 16:10, Full HD
features: HD Resolution & Wide Screen - 19-inch display with 1440x900 resolution and a 16:10 aspect ratio for clear and immersive visuals
Fast Response Time - 5ms response time for smooth, blur-free visuals, ideal for fast-paced tasks and gaming

products.title: ATLAS 17 Inch Square LED Monitor HDMI & VGA Support
products.subtitle: 17-inch, 4:3, Square
features: High-Definition Display - 17-inch screen with 1280x1024 HD resolution for sharp visuals
Fast Response Time - 5ms response time for smooth, blur-free visuals during fast-moving scenes

products.title: ATLAS ATS22VFB100 22 Inch Full HD 100Hz Monitor for Editors & Pros
products.subtitle: 22-inch, 100Hz, Pro Series
features: Full HD Display - 22-inch screen with a 1920x1080 resolution for sharp, detailed visuals
100Hz Refresh Rate - Smooth motion and reduced blur, perfect for gaming and fast-moving content

products.title: ATLAS ATS22IFW100 Pro Series 21.5" IPS 100Hz LED Monitor in White Crisp Visuals
products.subtitle: 21.5-inch, IPS, 100Hz
features: Full HD 1920x1080 Resolution - Delivers sharp and detailed visuals for a clear viewing experience
100Hz Refresh Rate - Ensures smooth motion with reduced blur, ideal for gaming and fast-moving content

products.title: ATLAS ATS22VFW100 Gamer's Edition 21.5" 100Hz Fast-Response Gaming LED Monitor
products.subtitle: 21.5-inch, 100Hz, Gaming
features: Full HD 1920x1080 Resolution - Provides crisp, sharp visuals for an immersive viewing experience
100Hz Refresh Rate - Ensures smoother motion, ideal for gaming and fast-moving content

footer.about: Atlas monitors keep your setup sharp and comfortable.
